I would start to slap back and then realize this is going to make it worse. My adrenline was pumping so much. I've never really been in a fight like this or attacked by a mob like this. Program, the U.S. Treasury can restrict senior management's compensation. "It was absolutely owed that we treat our people properly," CEO Sergio Marchionne told analysts and reporters on a conference call. The obligation to our people was much greater than the need to improve our bottom-line profitability. Sergio Marchionne chose the term performance award rather than profit sharing because "it's difficult to talk about profit sharing when you have a negative number at the bottom line."
